Write-Up Text: People are discussing the upcoming Australian budget with contrasting opinions. Some worry about the impact of proposed tax cuts for high-income earners in favour of funding essential services. Others talk about how the budget is set to affect specific groups such as veterans and citizens in the Northern Territory. There's a call to fund The V Centre Veteran Empowerment Program to tackle homelessness and suicide among veterans. Some raise concerns over defense spending cuts in the budget and others call for more renewable mineral investments.
